title: Spacious House Close to UC Berkeley | Shared yard
posting_body: Fantastic 3 bedroom residence with yard space in a superb location!

Situated a short walk from UC-Berkeley, Downtown, and Claremont Canyon Preserve, this spacious home boasts a large living room with vaulted ceiling, shelving, fireplace, and large bright windows; shared outdoor space with deck; and two bathrooms.
The eat-in kitchen is outfitted with a gas range, lots of cabinet/counter space, and a breakfast bar.
As an added bonus, two parking spaces are available for an additional fee, and laundry is on the premises.
This home can be provided furnished  - Please inquire.
- Kitchen with appliances and breakfast bar
- Huge living room with vaulted ceiling, fireplace, shelving, and large windows
- Can be provided furnished - please inquire
